title.narrative: Norwegian Refugee Council activities in Afghanistan, 2018-2020

description.narrative:
The overall objective is to provide safe, dignified and sustainable housing solutions for displaced Afghans, in a manner which promotes socio-economic integration and socio-cultural restoration. This will be achieved by three different programme components, and one learning and advocacy component:
1. Shelter construction in peri-urban and/or rural areas: Country of implementation: Afghanistan and Iran Total beneficiaries: 1,500 families (10,500 individuals)
2. Expansion and improvement of rental stock in urban areas, including through traditional building methods: Country of Implementation: Afghanistan Total Beneficiaries: 500 families (3,500 individuals)
3. Socio-economic (re)integration and urban regeneration: Country of Implementation: Afghanistan and Iran Total Beneficiaries: 350 individuals through training; 30,000 families (210,000 individuals) through community outreach.
4. Action research and advocacy on displacement-responsive urban housing solutions and regeneration: Country of Implementation: Afghanistan and Iran
